## ResourceValueMergeMethod type

Type representing the possible ways that a resource value can be merged into an existing resource. - 'augment' means that the new value should be merged into the existing value, with new properties added and existing properties updated. - 'delete' means that the existing values should be deleted. - 'replace' means that the new value should replace the existing value.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ResourceValueMergeMethod = 'augment' | 'delete' | 'replace';
```
